verses.verse: בְּךָֽ־ יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> In thee O LORD חָסִ֑יתִי <S%H2620><s%> do I put my trust אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay אֵב֥וֹשָׁה <S%H954><s%> be put to confusion לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> In

בְּצִדְקָתְךָ֗ <S%H6666><s%> me in thy righteousness תַּצִּילֵ֥נִי <S%H5337><s%> Deliver וּֽתְפַלְּטֵ֑נִי <S%H6403><s%> and cause me to escape הַטֵּֽה־ <S%H5186><s%> incline אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> about אָ֝זְנְךָ֗ <S%H241><s%> thine ear וְהוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3467><s%> unto me and save

הֱיֵ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become לִ֨י ׀ לְצ֥וּר <S%H6697><s%> Be thou my strong מָע֡וֹן <S%H4583><s%> habitation לָב֗וֹא <S%H935><s%> resort תָּמִ֗יד <S%H8548><s%> whereunto I may continually צִוִּ֥יתָ <S%H6680><s%> thou hast given commandment לְהוֹשִׁיעֵ֑נִי <S%H3467><s%> to save כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for סַלְעִ֖י <S%H5553><s%> me for thou [art] my rock וּמְצוּדָתִ֣י <S%H4686><s%> and my fortress אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> O

אֱ‍ֽלֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> me O my God פַּ֭לְּטֵנִי <S%H6403><s%> Deliver מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> out of the hand רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked מִכַּ֖ף <S%H3709><s%> out of the hand מְעַוֵּ֣ל <S%H5765><s%> of the unrighteous וְחוֹמֵץ׃ <S%H2556><s%> and cruel man

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> You תִקְוָתִ֑י <S%H8615><s%> For thou [art] my hope אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> O Lord יְ֝הוִ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD מִבְטַחִ֥י <S%H4009><s%> [thou art] my trust מִנְּעוּרָֽי׃ <S%H5271><s%> from my youth

עָלֶ֤יךָ ׀ <S%H5921><s%> and נִסְמַ֬כְתִּי <S%H5564><s%> By thee have I been holden up מִבֶּ֗טֶן <S%H990><s%> from the womb מִמְּעֵ֣י <S%H4578><s%> bowels אִ֭מִּי <S%H517><s%> me out of my mother's אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> who גוֹזִ֑י <S%H1491><s%> thou art he that took בְּךָ֖ תְהִלָּתִ֣י <S%H8416><s%> my praise תָמִֽיד׃ <S%H8548><s%> [shall be] continually

כְּ֭מוֹפֵת <S%H4159><s%> I am as a wonder הָיִ֣יתִי <S%H1961><s%> have become לְרַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> unto many וְ֝אַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> you מַֽחֲסִי־ <S%H4268><s%> refuge עֹֽז׃ <S%H5797><s%> but thou [art] my strong

יִמָּ֣לֵא <S%H4390><s%> be filled פִ֭י <S%H6310><s%> Let my mouth תְּהִלָּתֶ֑ךָ <S%H8416><s%> [with] thy praise כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> all the day תִּפְאַרְתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H8597><s%> [and with] thy honour

אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּ֭שְׁלִיכֵנִי <S%H7993><s%> Cast me not off לְעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> in the time זִקְנָ֑ה <S%H2209><s%> of old age כִּכְל֥וֹת <S%H3615><s%> faileth כֹּ֝חִ֗י <S%H3581><s%> me not when my strength אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּעַזְבֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5800><s%> forsake

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אָמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> speak אוֹיְבַ֣י <S%H341><s%> For mine enemies לִ֑י וְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <S%H8104><s%> against me and they that lay wait נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> for my soul נוֹעֲצ֥וּ <S%H3289><s%> take counsel יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> together

לֵ֭אמֹר <S%H559><s%> Saying אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> God עֲזָב֑וֹ <S%H5800><s%> hath forsaken רִֽדְפ֥וּ <S%H7291><s%> him persecute וְ֝תִפְשׂ֗וּהוּ <S%H8610><s%> and take כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there מַצִּֽיל׃ <S%H5337><s%> him for [there is] none to deliver

אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> O God אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּרְחַ֣ק <S%H7368><s%> be not far מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> from me O my God לְעֶזְרָ֥תִי <S%H5833><s%> for my help [חִישָׁה כ] (חֽוּשָׁה׃ <S%H2363><s%> haste ק)

יֵבֹ֣שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> Let them be confounded יִכְלוּ֮ <S%H3615><s%> [and] consumed שֹׂטְנֵ֪י <S%H7853><s%> that are adversaries נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <S%H5315><s%> to my soul יַֽעֲט֣וּ <S%H5844><s%> let them be covered חֶ֭רְפָּה <S%H2781><s%> [with] reproach וּכְלִמָּ֑ה <S%H3639><s%> and dishonour מְ֝בַקְשֵׁ֗י <S%H1245><s%> that seek רָעָתִֽי׃ <S%H7451><s%> my hurt

וַ֭אֲנִי <S%H589><s%> I תָּמִ֣יד <S%H8548><s%> continually אֲיַחֵ֑ל <S%H3176><s%> But I will hope וְ֝הוֹסַפְתִּ֗י <S%H3254><s%> thee more עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner תְּהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8416><s%> and will yet praise

פִּ֤י ׀ <S%H6310><s%> My mouth יְסַפֵּ֬ר <S%H5608><s%> shall shew forth צִדְקָתֶ֗ךָ <S%H6666><s%> thy righteousness כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> all the day תְּשׁוּעָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H8668><s%> [and] thy salvation כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> not יָדַ֣עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> for I know סְפֹרֽוֹת׃ <S%H5615><s%> not the numbers

אָב֗וֹא <S%H935><s%> I will go in בִּ֭גְבֻרוֹת <S%H1369><s%> the strength אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> of the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD אַזְכִּ֖יר <S%H2142><s%> I will make mention צִדְקָתְךָ֣ <S%H6666><s%> of thy righteousness לְבַדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H905><s%> alone

אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> O God לִמַּדְתַּ֥נִי <S%H3925><s%> thou hast taught מִנְּעוּרָ֑י <S%H5271><s%> me from my youth וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הֵ֝֗נָּה <S%H2008><s%> here אַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> and hitherto have I declared נִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6381><s%> thy wondrous works

וְגַ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> and even עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Now also when זִקְנָ֨ה ׀ <S%H2209><s%> I am old וְשֵׂיבָה֮ <S%H7872><s%> and grayheaded אֱלֹהִ֪ים <S%H430><s%> O God אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּעַ֫זְבֵ֥נִי <S%H5800><s%> forsake עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Until אַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> me not until I have shewed זְרוֹעֲךָ֣ <S%H2220><s%> thy strength לְד֑וֹר <S%H1755><s%> unto [this] generation לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all יָ֝ב֗וֹא <S%H935><s%> to every one [that] is to come גְּבוּרָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1369><s%> [and] thy power

וְצִדְקָתְךָ֥ <S%H6666><s%> Thy righteousness אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> also O God עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> to מָ֫ר֥וֹם <S%H4791><s%> [is] very high אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who עָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> who hast done גְדֹל֑וֹת <S%H1419><s%> great things אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> O God מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> who כָמֽוֹךָ׃ <S%H3644><s%> is like

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who [הִרְאִיתַנוּ כ] (הִרְאִיתַ֨נִי <S%H7200><s%> advise self ק) צָר֥וֹת <S%H6869><s%> troubles רַבּ֗וֹת <S%H7227><s%> me great וְרָ֫ע֥וֹת <S%H7451><s%> and sore תָּשׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> me again [תְּחַיֵּינוּ כ] (תְּחַיֵּ֑ינִי <S%H2421><s%> keep leave ק) וּֽמִתְּהֹמ֥וֹת <S%H8415><s%> from the depths הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth תָּשׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> again תַּעֲלֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5927><s%> and shalt bring me up
תֶּ֤רֶב ׀ <S%H7235><s%> Thou shalt increase גְּֽדֻלָּתִ֗י <S%H1420><s%> my greatness וְתִסֹּ֥ב <S%H5437><s%> me on every side תְּֽנַחֲמֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5162><s%> and comfort

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> will also אֲנִ֤י ׀ <S%H589><s%> I אוֹדְךָ֣ <S%H3034><s%> I will also praise בִכְלִי־ <S%H3627><s%> with נֶבֶל֮ <S%H5035><s%> A harp אֲמִתְּךָ֪ <S%H571><s%> [even] thy truth אֱלֹ֫הָ֥י <S%H430><s%> O my God אֲזַמְּרָ֣ה <S%H2167><s%> unto thee will I sing לְךָ֣ בְכִנּ֑וֹר <S%H3658><s%> with the harp קְ֝ד֗וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> O thou Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

תְּרַנֵּ֣נָּ֣ה <S%H7442><s%> shall greatly rejoice שְׂ֭פָתַי <S%H8193><s%> My lips כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when אֲזַמְּרָה־ <S%H2167><s%> when I sing לָּ֑ךְ וְ֝נַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> unto thee and my soul אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which פָּדִֽיתָ׃ <S%H6299><s%> which thou hast redeemed

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also לְשׁוֹנִ֗י <S%H3956><s%> My tongue כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַ֭יּוֹם <S%H3117><s%> all the day תֶּהְגֶּ֣ה <S%H1897><s%> also shall talk צִדְקָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H6666><s%> of thy righteousness כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בֹ֥שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> long for they are confounded כִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for חָ֝פְר֗וּ <S%H2659><s%> for they are brought unto shame מְבַקְשֵׁ֥י <S%H1245><s%> that seek רָעָתִֽי׃ <S%H7451><s%> my hurt
